user_question: What is the most unusual restaurant in the world and what makes it unique?
final_answer: The Ithaa Undersea Restaurant in the Maldives is considered one of the most unusual restaurants in the world because it is located 16 feet below sea level, offering diners a 180-degree panoramic view of the vibrant coral gardens surrounding it.
